title: Understanding Gender-Based Violence
subtitle: A gentle introduction to GBV
content: Gender-based violence (GBV) includes harmful actions directed at someone because of their gender. It can be emotional, physical, financial, or psychological. This article helps readers understand what GBV is and how communities can respond with empathy.
author: GBV Awareness Team

title: How to Support a Friend Experiencing Abuse
content: Supporting someone going through abuse requires patience, calm listening, and reassurance that their experiences matter. This guide offers practical steps for responding compassionately without forcing decisions.
author: Lerato Dlamini

title: Your Legal Rights in South Africa
subtitle: Understanding protection orders and support
content: South African law offers several forms of protection for people experiencing GBV. This article outlines how protection orders work, what rights survivors have, and how to access free legal assistance.
author: Justice & Rights Collective

title: Healing After Trauma: Small Steps Matter
subtitle: Understanding healing as a journey
content: Healing after GBV is not linear. This article focuses on small, gradual steps survivors can take to rebuild safety, trust, and self-compassion.
author: Wellbeing Collective

title: GBV Prevention for Young People
subtitle: Creating safe environments for youth
content: Young people deserve safe schools and communities. This article discusses respectful relationships, boundaries, and community-led prevention strategies.
author: Youth Safety Network

title: Online Safety and Digital Abuse
subtitle: Recognizing harmful digital behaviour
content: Digital abuse includes controlling access to devices, monitoring messages, and using online spaces to harass. This article teaches readers how to stay safe online.
author: Cyber Safety SA

title: Building Safer Campuses
content: Educational institutions can promote safety through policies, training, and accessible reporting structures. Learn how campuses can protect students and staff.
author: Campus Safety Network

title: How to Reach Out for Help Safely
subtitle: Practical guidance for survivors
content: Reaching out for help can be overwhelming. This article gives step-by-step instructions for contacting organisations, helplines, or trusted individuals safely.
author: Community Care Desk

title: Understanding Consent
subtitle: Why consent is essential
content: Consent is about mutual agreement, clear communication, and respect. This article explains consent in everyday situations and relationships.
author: Healthy Relationships Initiative

title: Recognizing Emotional Abuse
content: Emotional abuse can include manipulation, threats, and isolation. This article describes signs to look for and how to navigate emotional harm safely.
author: GBV Support Network
